Eventually, it turned out that the cause of the\nblackout had been electrical instability\nresulting from chronic power shortages.%K%P
The blackouts Akane had been causing had\nactually been keeping the larger problem at bay.%K%P
Once the problem was known, Kannagi started\nrunning planned rolling blackouts to deal with\nthe shortages.%K%P
As for Akane, since she solved the major\nblackout she hadn't caused any more small ones.%K%P
She was able to finish rehab, without fear of\nbeing demoted to a spirit and without fear of\ngetting Tsubaki Apartments demolished.%K%P
We were sitting on the veranda one day.%K%P
'Phew... Lately, it's been getting colder when\nthe sun goes down. Winter is on the way.'%K%P
'Yep. I hope it gets here soon.'%K%P
'Why? I hate going out in the cold.'%K%P
'Really? I'm looking forward to spending all\nkinds of seasons with you.'%K%P
I pulled Akane even closer to me.%K%P
'If you put it that way, I hope winter comes\nsoon, too.'%K%P
'Right?'%K%P
We sat there and watched the evening sky.%K%P
'The stars are so pretty.'%K%P
'Yeah, they seem particularly bright tonight.'%K%P
The artificial light of the city was reduced as\nsome parts were in a rolling blackout, so the\nstars shone through brighter.%K%P
'You know, it feels like we met just yesterday.'%K%P
'Really?'%K%P
But I felt she had a point.%K%P
'I didn't want to be rehabilitated at first. But\nnow I know how hard life can be for people. I'm\nhappy I could change...'%K%P
'It all happened because of how hard you tried.'%K%P
'No, it never would have happened with just me.\nI only made it because I met you.'%K%P
'I'm so glad you stopped for me that night.'%K%P
'If I hadn't met you, I never could have changed\nlike this.'%K%P
'I never would have noticed people's kindness, I\nwould've kept being selfish. And I would have\nkept causing trouble until I became a spirit.'%K%P
I patted Akane as she thought about her past.%K%P
'It doesn't matter. We did meet.'%K%P
'What's the use of thinking about what-ifs on a\nnight like this?'%K%P
'Yeah. I don't even want to imagine it.'%K%P
She touched my hand gently.%K%P
I wrapped my fingers in hers and squeezed her\nhand.%K%P
'Akane, are you happy now?'%K%P
Akane's face went blank for an instant, then she\nbroke out in a broad smile.%K%P
'Of course I am!'%K%P
Akane went on to speak, full of confidence.%K%P
'Everyone around me is great, Maika and Inori\nare so wonderful, and you're my boyfriend. I'm\nso happy!'%K%P
'Yeah... I'm happy I'm your boyfriend, too.'%K%P
I was happy just having her beside me.%K%P
I was so in love with her, I couldn't imagine\nlife without her anymore.%K%P
'But it's so strange. With just a little change\nin perspective, the world suddenly looks so much\nmore fun than before.'%K%P
'I changed because I met you. I got to know so\nmany people, and see how they lived. And then I\ngrew to want to protect them.'%K%P
'And now that you have control of your powers,\nwe can be even happier together.'%K%P
'I could only do that because of you. I finally\nlearned to think about other people's feelings.'%K%P
'There are so many people here besides just me,\nand they all have their own lives and feelings.'%K%P
'I'm an Aragami, but I want to help spread my\nhappiness to everyone little by little.'%K%P
'You will. You might be an Aragami, but when it\ncomes to caring for people, you're a true\ngoddess.'%K%P
'Of course! But you know, I am what I am.'%K%P
'I do what I want! That might cause you a bit of\nbother, but it might also help some people.'%K%P
'Isn't that bad for a goddess?'%K%P
'Maybe, but remember! I'm an Aragami!'%K%P
